1.content: First of all, we need to determine your age group.
1.title: Age

11.content: Okay, so you're in your beginning years of high school! Now what's your gender?
11.title: Younger high school student (14-16)

111.content:
Okay, so you're a girl. Now we have to determine who's going to accompany you on your 'mission'. 3 people will be able to go with you: your best friend, your love interest, and your love interest's best friend/your best friend's love interest (if that makes sense). The third person will be determined, depending on who your love interest is.

You can choose your love interest from these three:

Alexander Caldwell - 17. He's a 5'10" junior with black hair and gray eyes. He doesn't talk much and he always looks like he's ready to kill someone, but he can't really help it -- he just naturally looks intimidating. That doesn't mean he isn't attractive though. Xander's really smart and athletic, so that'll help you out a lot. Just make sure you don't piss him off.

Aiden Falcon - 17. He's 5'8" and has light brown hair with brown eyes. He has ADHD and because of that, he's easily distracted, impulsive, and short-tempered, which lands him in detention a lot of times. There's a plus side to it though: it gives him lightning reflexes and since he can't concentrate well, he's able to find things other people can't. He kinda gave up on school and has a lot of bad grades, but he's one of the best athletes and fighters in the school. You'll definitely have an interesting time with this one.

Jayden Sharky - 17 and also a junior. He has a blonde moehawk and blue eyes. He's energetic, outgoing, funny, and a bit clumsy, but that's his charm. He plays soccer and basketball, and is pretty well-known in the school. He may not have the best grades, but he has random knowledge and experience. For example, he knows he seems to know every car, video game, and celebrity out there. And excuse him if it seems he's 'not on earth" -- you can say he's a bit dirty-minded.

So . . . who do you like?
111.title: Female

choices: Shrug it off. You'll just review tonight. Chemistry isn't that hard anyways.
Decide to go to the library and study. House of the Living Dead III can wait.
1111.content:
Start of Story

3:15 PM
San Francisco, California
Last Period Study Hall


" . . . Do you have a three?"

"Goldfish. Do you have an eight?"

"Yeah, here. Do you have a ten?"

"Goldfish. Do you have a king?"

"Go-- You know what? Forget this." From across table, your best friend, Natalyn, threw down her cards. "Why're we playing Goldfish anyways?" she asked.

You shrugged. "I don't know," you said. "Do you have any better ideas?"

" . . . No."

"Yeah, I thought so." You stifled a snicker when you saw her groan in frustration. Then, glancing at the clock, you realized the time and looked at the girl you've known for nearly 2 years with a questioning look. "Hey, didn't your brother's plane land two hours from now?"

Natalyn shrugged. "I don't know. Pft, if I'm lucky, it crashes instead."

Natalyn had an older brother named Alexander who lived in Washington DC with their father, a special director in the CIA. A few weeks ago, it was announced that he would be moving to Cali today. The reason why was unknown -- even to Natalyn -- but whatever it was, it was meant to be a secret between him and their parents.

You snapped back to reality when Natalyn spoke up: "Hey, wanna come over after school today?" she asked.

"To meet your brother?" you question, raising an eyebrow.

Natalyn snorted. "Pft, no. I was talking about watching 'House of the Living Dead III'. Didn't you say you wanted to come over and watch it yesterday?"

Oh, yeah, you did say that. Just as you were about to reply, realization struck you. Tomorrow you have a chemistry test! You . . .
1111.title: Good Luck With Alexander Caldwell!

choices: You stay put like Natalyn instructed you to.
You go against Natalyn's instructions and run upstairs.
11111.content:
"Oh, yeah. Sure," you reply.

After school ends about 15 minutes later, you and Natalyn head back to her house. It didn't take long to get there considering you guys took the school bus. Once you guys arrive at her house, she opens her door and lets you in before closing it gently. However, just as you guys begin to settle in, you hear a noise upstairs.Both of you freeze and immediately glance over at each other.

"Did you hear that?" Natalyn asks softly.

You slowly nod. "Is your mom home?" you whisper to her.

"No, she's coming home late today. It can't be my brother either -- his plane didn't land yet. It's a burglar."

A chill makes its way up your spine. Natalyn notices your nervousness. "Shh, stay calm. I'll handle this. Just hide and make sure you don't go upstairs." She then tip toes over to the closet, opens the door, and pulls out a shiny baseball bat. She then starts to head over to the stairs but just as she climbs the first step, you hold her back.

"But what if you get hurt?" you ask nervously.

Natalyn shoots you a smirk. "I'm the daughter of a CIA director -- this is gonna be a piece of cake. Now hide, and don't get out until I come back down."

You nod and give her a "Good luck" before taking cover in a closet. She sends you one last reassuring look before disappearing up the stairs. Everything remains quiet for a while.

Then a loud crash is heard upstairs.
11111.title: Shrug it off. You'll just review tonight.

choices: Decide to stay a bit longer
111112.content:
Natalyn is your best friend; there's no way you're going to just sit around and let her take on anyone alone.

With renewed confidence, you slowly open the closet door and creep out, aware of your surroundings. As you pass the kitchen sink, you spot a knife holder. Realizing the burglar might be armed, you grab a knife before making your way upstairs quietly.

The door beside Natalyn's room is open and no noise is heard. With a battle cry that could put any gladiator to shame, you jump into the room, ready to face any danger that awaits you.

Just to find Natalyn standing beside an older, black-haired guy that is no doubt her brother.

Upon seeing you, the older Caldwell whips out a gun from his jacket and points it at you, so fast everything was a blur.

"Hey, stop!" Natalyn yells at her brother. "She's a friend!"

Hearing this, the black-haired wonder lowers his gun. "Should I be disturbed at the fact that your friend is holding a butcher knife?"

You look at the weapon in your hand before grinning sheepishly. "Sorry, I thought Natalyn was in trouble."

The older Caldwell tucks his weapon back safely under his jacket with a blank face. "Well it's good to see my sister chose a faithful friend." He then turns to Natalyn. "Dad decided to use the CIA private jet instead so that's why I'm early. Anyway, I need to talk to you about something."

You glance between the two siblings. This is most likely about private matters concerning the CIA, so it's probably best for you to leave. But then again, if it really is private, they would've asked you to leave already. You . . .
111112.title: You go against Natalyn's instructions

11112.content:
"Sorry, I can't go," you apologize. "I just remembered I have to go study for a chem test tomorrow."

Natalyn shrugs. "Okay," she says. "We'll watch it next time."

The bell then rings and once you gather your things, you and Natalyn part ways. You head to the city library soon afterwards, taking a few bus routes before arriving at the public library. Once you arrive, you take a seat at an empty table near the corner of the building. However, before you could open up your book, you get tackled into a bear hug.

"Hi!" a cheerful voice exclaims.

You know turn slightly to get a glimpse of blonde hair. It's Jay, one of your best guy friends. You . . .
11112.title: You go to the library and study

choices: Throw your pencil bag at him
Crush his toe with the leg of your chair
1112.content:
Let me just warn you that he may be a little . . . hostile . . . towards you at first. Don't take it the wrong way -- he'll lighten up eventually.


Start of Story

8:30 AM
San Francisco, California
1st Period Literature


" . . . and so that is why Midsummer Night's Dream is one of Shakespeare's greatest works," Ms. Agatha, the Literature teacher, finished.

Not like you were paying attention though. Literature had never been your best subject, nor your favorite -- and it never will be.

Beside you, your best friend, Ally, was snoring away lightly. You feel slightly jealous of how she had the guts to sleep in Ms. Agatha's class, considering the witch woman would always hand out detention slips whenever she had the chance to. Still feeling bored out of your mind, you take a look around the room: Tony was secretly texting someone behind his textbook, Jason was making paper airplanes and aiming them at Martin Jonas's head, Amy was doodling in her notebook, and Oliver Horan was listening to music through his headphones which were hidden inside his jacket sleeve.

You sigh and stare out the window.

Such a nice day outside, you thought to yourself. Too bad we're stuck in here.

Just as you were about to drift off to Daydream Land, you suddenly felt something strike the back of your head. Turning your head, you look back to see stupid Aiden Falcon sitting at the seat behind you, playing with a paper ball in his hand while smirking mischievously at you.

You rolled your eyes before turning back around to face the front of the room. No way was this guy gonna get you in trouble.

Again.

Unfortunately, Aiden didn't stop there. For the next 5 minutes, he continued pelting the back of your head with paper balls. Finally, you had enough. While Ms. Agatha had her back turned to the class, you . . .
1112.title: Aiden Falcon

choices: Go to detention. School's more important.
Skip detention. Ashton Radcliff's wayyy better.
11121.content:
You quickly grab your pencil bag and making sure Ms. Agatha wasn't looking, you turned around the hurled it towards Aiden. Unfortunately though, Ms. Agatha turned around in time. She gasped after seeing the scene.

"Mr. Falcon, Ms. Daniels!" she shrilled. "No horse playing in my class! Detention!"

You facepalmed yourself and from behind you, you could hear Aiden groan.

Great. Once again, Aiden has dragged you into detention.

A Few Hours Later


It was 4:00. You know what that meant?

Dismissal.

Unfortunately though, you had detention with that idiot known as Aiden Falcon. You pack up your things at your locker and started heading towards the cafeteria for your oh-so-exciting time with Ms. Agatha. However, on the way there, you noticed Aiden heading out the school building with his friends, laughing and backpack in hand. At that moment, Ally and your other friend, Tony, approached you.

"Hey," you said to them, still looking at Aiden. "Where's he going? He has detention too!"

Tony raised an eyebrow. "Didn't you hear? Ashton Radcliff's coming to the Galleria mall today for some autograph signings."

Your eyes immediately widened. Ashton Radcliff was the hottest 17-year-old actor out there. The fact that he was coming to San Francisco was, like, amazing. You doubt you'll ever get the chance to meet him in person ever again. After some thinking, you decide to . . .
11121.title: Oh, Sweet Detention

112.content:
Okay, so you're a guy. Now we have to determine who's going to accompany you on your 'mission'. 3 people will be able to go with you: your best friend, your love interest, and your love interest's best friend/your best friend's love interest (if that makes sense). The third person will be determined, depending on who your love interest is.

You can choose your love interest from these three:

Amy Carrolton - 16. One of the smartest girls in the whole school. She has long blonde hair, blue eyes, and stands at 5'5". She may seem a little hostile towards you at first, but that's just normal, considering your personalities are almost completely different. Amy has a photographic memory and since her parents are doctors, she has a lot of knowledge regarding health and treatments. You'll definitely get a lot of help if you choose her.

Jini Sharky - 15. Jini is an energetic girl that has brown hair, blue eyes, and stands at 5'2". She's outgoing, cute, social, and one of the most known people in the whole town. Why? Because she's always causing some kind of trouble. It's okay though, because everyone likes her. She has a lot of tricks up her sleeve and always has some kind of plan -- they may be crazy, but they work. She's also a really good actress, but it's obvious she's interested in you -- go for it!

Natalyn Caldwell - 15. The school's track and tennis star. She has long black hair, brown eyes, and is 5'3". Natalyn may come off as mean and indifferent sometimes but she's actually pretty caring. Natalyn has an older brother named Xander and they always argue, but thanks to him, she's amazing at martial arts. Watch out for her pride and temper though!

So . . . who seems to interest you?
112.title: Male

12.content: Now are you a male or female?
12.title: Older high school student (17-18)

122.title: Female

13.content: What are you majoring in? Your specialty will help you in the future chapters.
13.title: College student (18-24)

131.content:
Okay, so you're currently majoring in business. Your skills include psychology, fast thinking, an extremely good memory, calculating statistics, knowledge of other businesses and the economy, world geography, the quality of leadership, good judge of character, realistic acting, and skillful lying.

Now that we've determined your major, what is your gender?
131.title: Business

132.content:
Congratulations on being in the medical field! Your skills include:

- knowledge of health
- knowledge of poisons
- knowledge of herbs and plants
- knowledge of medicines diseases
- quick thinking
- treating wounds
- smooth talking
- identifying sicknesses
- an extremely good memory

Now that we've established that, are you male or female?
132.title: Pediatrics/Medicine

133.content:
Okay, so you're majoring in criminal justice/law enforcement and you are currently a student of the local police academy.


Your skills include:

- psychology
- quick reflexes
- criminal profiling
- picklocking
- sharp aiming and concentration
- usage of weapons
- weapon knowledge
- intimidation

Now that we've established your major, are you a male or a female?
133.title: Criminal Justice/Law Enforcement

14.content: What is your job? This will determine your specialties in the future chapters.
14.title: Young adult/Adult (25-45)

info.brief_description: The aliens are coming, and the only person that knows how to stop them is you.
info.description:
You always thought life for you was going to be normal. Pft, wrong. After waking up one morning, you turn on the news and find out that reports are coming in, saying flying saucers have been seen flying around the whole country the previous night, and that they all believe an invasion has come. And not just any invasion.

THE Invasion.

Following events soon prove that your great great great 20x great grandfather had predicted this. The only way to get rid of the aliens is to get to New York City and smash the aliens' source of power, a large, glowing green orb that generates power and is used to communicate with their motherland. It's not going to be easy though. Why?

Because the orb is on the very top of the Empire State Building, you can't use planes, and you're stuck all the way on the other side of the country.

Rules:

1. Character deaths are allowed, but only through bad and extreme decisions. Please keep it to a minimum though.
2. Minor slang words are alright, but please no completed swearing.
3. Correct grammar please. However, everyday language and incomplete sentences during quotes allowed.
4. Violence is allowed as long as it's not graphic.
5. Romance is encouraged, but nothing extreme.
6. Keep it second person point of view please.

Other than that, please add! Thanks for reading and enjoy!
